entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near noon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening and ending overnight. Clearing before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 3 April 2023
